meaningMnemonic: <kanji>Set aside</kanji> and <kanji>put</kanji> what you'll need to get the job done over there. These are the <vocabulary>measures</vocabulary> and <vocabulary>steps</vocabulary> we're taking to make sure things get done properly.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
